channel.title: Hardcore Christianity Podcast
channel.description: Some might call this podcast far right, extreme, or politically incorrect. I just call it like I see it. And in todays world, we've traveled so far away from God that simple Biblical standards are often considered "Hardcore Christianity". Hosted by CMV VJ, Surgeon. [ktfproductions.com]

item.title: 37_No-Status-Quo
item.description: No more being the run-of-the-mill for Christ.

item.title: 36_al-Qaeda
item.description: Why do radical Muslims hate Christians and how are we to respond? See what Surgeon has to say in this episode of "Hardcore Christianity".

item.title: 35_True-Persecution
item.description: Have you ever been persecuted for Christ? Surgeon talks about that and what true persecution really looks like.

item.title: 34_Stone-Casters
item.description: Surgeon challenges us not to be "stone casters", but to realize a very important thing that Jesus taught us in the story of the woman caught in the act of adultery.

item.title: 33_Far-Right-Politics
item.description: With elections right around the corner, Surgeon takes a look at how the media "demonizes" moralistic integrity as supported by the Bible in the political arena.

item.title: 32_Non-Glamorous Mission
item.description: Surgeon contemplates our mission to spread the Good News of Jesus Christ, and encourages you in this daunting task.

item.title: 31_Helping Others
item.description: In this episode, Surgeon encourages you to look at the parable of the good Samaritan from a different angle. It might inspire you to take more seriously the concept of helping others.

item.title: 30_Fear of the Lord
item.description: Surgeon reminds us why we must always have a healthy fear of the Lord.

item.title: 29_Role Model
item.description: Surgeon explains why it is biblically important to have Christian role models and to be a Christian role model.

item.title: 28_Fornication
item.description: Surgeon highlights what the bible says about fornication and how we as Hardcore Christians should try to live.

item.title: 27_Grace vs. Truth
item.description: Surgeon attempts to express why, when speaking to unbelievers about Christ, we should talk more about the Grace of Jesus above the Truth that without Jesus we deserve hell.

item.title: 26_Not Alone
item.description: Surgeon answers listener mail on the very challenging issue of those who say they believe only to satisfy those around them when deep inside, they do not.

item.title: 25_False Teachers
item.description: Hear what Surgeon has to say about the false teachers of our day and what we, as hardcore Christians, can do.

item.title: 24_Creation vs. Evolution
item.description: The new Ben Stein movie, "Expelled" has spurred on much conversation about the concept of Creation vs. Evolution. Hear as Surgeon explains why the Creation "theory" MUST be correct, and how this controversy may be swaying Christians from the faith.

item.title: 23_Conditional Judging
item.description: Surgeon explains why this podcast series is for believers, not unbelievers. And he explores why he believes "judging standards" are different when viewing believers vs. unbelievers.

item.title: 22_Sovereignty of God
item.description: Surgeon reveals his feelings about Christians who talk as though the know the mind of God - those who forget that God is Sovereign and sometimes He does things that we would not normally think He would do.

item.title: 21_Christian Music?
item.description: Surgeon talks about what makes a Christian song "Christian". And asks the question, "why are so many Christian artists selling out to the secular world?"

item.title: 20_Liberal World
item.description: Surgeon talks about where our world seems to be heading and poses the question, "What kind of world do you want to live in?".

item.title: 19_Great Commission
item.description: Surgeon encourages all hardcore Christians to heed the great commission.

item.title: 18_Jews and Gentiles
item.description: Surgeon shares what he learned during his trip to Israel - things that changed his way of thinking about the scripture.

item.title: 17_True Worship
item.description: How does the bible say that we, as Hardcore Christians, should worship God? Surgeon tries to answer what it means to worship in spirit and in truth.

item.title: 16_Christians Persecuting Christians
item.description: When we think of Christians being persecuted we often thing of unbelievers doing the persecuting. Find out what Surgeon has to say about Christians persecuting other Christians and how he thinks we need to respond as Hardcore Christians.

item.title: 15_Do Ghosts Exist?
item.description: Surgeon answers listener mail about the existence of ghosts. Find out what the Bible says about ghosts, and how hardcore Christians should think about them.

item.title: 14_Duty of Man
item.description: Ever wonder about the "meaning of life"? What the "whole duty of man" is? Well now you can find out from the words of the wisest man who ever lived. No, not Surgeon, but King Solomon. It may give you a whole new perspective on life. It did for Surgeon.

item.title: 13_Holiday Destruction
item.description: Santa Claus, the Easter Bunny, what has society done with our holy holidays?! In this Easter episode of Hardcore Christianity, Surgeon talks about the concept of both of these icons and his feelings about how they can affect our children.

item.title: 12_Watered Down Messages
item.description: Do you like to be told what you want to hear, or what you need to hear when sitting in a pew? In this podcast Surgeon reveals his view on watered down messages, and praises hardcore pastors who tell it like it is.

item.title: 11_Christian Sims
item.description: Ever play a version of the video game called "Sims"? Join Surgeon as he explores a gaming concept, based off of this game, that he thinks will help every player live a hardcore life.

item.title: 10_A Raw Deal
item.description: Adam put a wrench in our whole program. Sometimes its frusterating to think that we didn't create this spiritual chasm ourselves, but we have to live in it anyway. In this podcast, Surgeon takes a look at this whole dynamic and puts a face to the problem.

item.title: 09_Abortion
item.description: The issue of abortion is another hot topic in America. It seems that everyone has something to say about it. Surgeon is no exception. Check out this podcast and hear his hardcore point of view on the subject.

item.title: 08_Prosperity Preaching
item.description: Often times we as Christians are inadvertently taught to see what we can get from God; that we should be prosperous because we are Christians. In this podcast, Surgeon talks about seeking God's face instead of his hands.

item.title: 07_Die to Self
item.description: Many Christians struggle with dying to self. This podcast explores the concept through the eyes of one who has gone through extremes to die to self.

item.title: 06_Armor of God
item.description: The Bible challenges us to "put on the full armor of God so that we can take our stand against the devil's schemes." Find out a secret as to how Surgeon uses this scripture to gauge his walk.

item.title: 05_The Bane of Television
item.description: One of the best indicators of how our society has fallen away from God's original plan is the state of television. This episode explores Surgeon's views on how TV has corrupted our society, and what some Hardcore Christians have done to counteract its effects.

item.title: 04_Homosexuality
item.description: Homosexuality in America is a touchy issue. It really shouldn't be though. The Bible is very clear about the topic. Find out what the Bible says regarding homosexuality and how we as Hardcore Christians should look at this issue.

item.title: 03_Filthy Language
item.description: How do you feel when you hear Christians using filthy language? Maybe you use it yourself. This podcast addresses filthy language and finds out what the Bible has to say about it.

item.title: 02_Levels of Faith
item.description: I believe that how hardcore our Christian walk directly correlates to the level of faith we have in the truth. In this episode, I share my thoughts on how we can all become hardcore Christians.

item.title: 01_Intro
item.description: This podcast serves as an introduction to the series and its purpose.
